A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Having seen it overseas already\, I am now wholly engrossed in the sequel trilogy like never before. The story takes risks\, and the risks pay off. From each character's trajectory to new characters to new combinations of characters - this movie has it all completely right. The running time was long\, a little too long (hello\, first act)\, but at least every moment had something important happening. Rey is not Luke Skywalker. Luke is not Yoda. Kylo is not Darth Vader. Don't expect a rehash of the initial trilogy. This is something new\, something different\, and something wonderful.
